name: Financial Depths
description:
Reach new depths of depts in this strategy(?) survival game!

Use your credit cards to pay your bills… then use the credit cards to pay the credit cards. How long can that last? That’s up to you!

Ld48 entry

Note

Didn't have time to add some limitation; I dont recommend taking all credit card. selecting stuff will be hard

minor changes
sound bug fixed, fixed fees not happening
